translations: v．低估，对……评价过低：对某人或某物的价值、能力、重要性等给予过低的评价。

sentences.sentence: At present, the curriculum evaluation of modern distance education in China still places much emphasis on summative assessment and underrates formative assessment.
sentences.translation: 目前我国现代远程教育的课程评价仍然侧重于终结性评价，对形成性评价的重视程度不足。
